      • convertToGroupChat

        public void convertToGroupChat(java.lang.String nickname)
        Convert this chat session to a group chat. If it's already a group chat, nothing will happen. The method works in async mode and the registered listener will be notified when it's converted to group chat successfully. Note that the method is not thread-safe since it's always called from the UI and Android uses single thread mode for UI.

      • isGroupChatSession

        public boolean isGroupChatSession()
        Description copied from interface: IChatSession
        Tells if this ChatSession is a group session.

      • inviteContact

        public void inviteContact(java.lang.String contact)
        Description copied from interface: IChatSession
        Invites a contact to join this ChatSession. The user can only invite contacts to join this ChatSession if it's a group session. Nothing will happen if this is a simple one-to-one ChatSession.

      • leave

        Description copied from interface: IChatSession
